That bodysuit really doesn't leave anything up to the imagination, huh...
Well, whatever, I've still got my eye on you, vampire succubus.
First of all, gross. Secondly, I do not do such indecent things! So don't ask me about them, you stupid succubus!
I can't say it does, Toph. I definitely like to be watched and praised, but I don't think I'd want to know that much about the people doing so.
Cut it with the gross talk, succubus! You shouldn't be discussing these things in front of a goddess!!

Although... Guiding people to the afterlife isn't exactly my job anymore. You see, some depraved shut‑in NEET ended up roping me into defeating the Devil King with him. But he hasn't made any progress so far. Honestly, can you believe he's not even thankful for my help?

Although... Guiding people to the afterlife isn't exactly my job anymore. You see, thanks to this shut‑in NEET, I can't go back to heaven until he defeats the Devil King. And he's not even thankful for all of the gracious help I provide either.

Although... Guiding people to the afterlife isn't exactly my job anymore. Believe it or not, this shut‑in NEET had the audacity to drag me down from heaven as his cheat item. I tell you, the depravity of this man is unfathomable.
Nicknames, eh? Well, I can call you Aqua just fine, and you should call me Lady Aqua! Considering I'm a goddess, I believe that's the most logical solution.
Oh, is that so? I see... I never would've thought I'd find another person named Aqua here. Much less one that is so blue...
Did you really have to bring along your maid for this, vampire? Hmph, you better not be using her to cheat...
(I can't believe I lost to some stupid undead disguised as a human...)

condition.saying: one thing we wouldn't change about ourselves

case.state: Oh please, I wouldn't change anything about myself. I'm a goddess! I'm already perfect in every way!

Hmm...
(Is this girl really a goddess? Her aura tells me yes, but...)

state.text: Why give a round of applause for the dealer when you could instead do it for a real act? Watch! Nature's Beauty!
Why give a round of applause for the dealer when you could instead do it for a real act? Watch! Nature's Beauty!

case.state: A round of applause for this lousy dealer that has allowed the goddess to lose this much? Hmph, I think not.
A round of applause for this lousy dealer that allowed the goddess to lose? Hmph, I think not.
I don't care how convincing your human costume was, I won't show you any mercy from now on.
Hm? What is it, Dark Magician Girl?
With you here? Hardly.
I'm only having fun because I get to make you lose. It's what you deserve, after all.

condition.saying: WE WILL ALWAYS RETURN!!

case.state: Oh, you're back. And you're a ghost...
Please, a goddess like me has nothing to fear!
Fears? Pfft! I don't have any fears! I'm a goddess!
Huh? You can? I was pretty sure ghosts couldn't eat a thing...
What? No you can't... Ghosts shouldn't be able to eat...

No thanks, I'll pa---Hm... Actually, maybe if you told me where you live, Spooky...
(This is totally a trap to get people in her haunted house... But I can just put up a barrier and purify the ghosts there! Heh, I'm a genius!)
Dating any kind of monsters is a terrible idea...
If anyone has thought about dating monsters in the first place, I'd be more worried about what's wrong with their heads...

Is there anyone sick enough to want that from a ghost?
...actually never mind, there definitely is.
That's right! Grr... Those wretched vampires... Scum, nothing but scum.
Gross... And vampires were already gross in the first place...
I can attest to that. The stench of zombies has to be one of the worst ones out there.
Honestly, I feel like if someone is depraved enough to date a zombie, they might just be into being bitten too...
Losing your soul to a succubus is indeed not worth it. But, I seriously doubt you could do better.
Mummies... Definitely one of the most unpleasant undead species...
I think even the non‑mortals should steer clear from werewolves as far as dating goes...
How do you even know this? Are there really that many people in a relationship with a werewolf...? {small}Humanity seriously feels like a lost cause sometimes...
Surely you have to be joking... There can't be any humans sick enough to date Arachne, right...?

I suppose especially perverted humans that are already blind wouldn't care...
Wait, why am I even entertaining this thought?!
Slimes are seriously bad news... Touching them at all is already dangerous, dating them is way out of the question.
No kidding. I can hardly picture anyone stupid enough to date a skeleton.
She's your what?! You're seriously in a relationship with a ghost?
What?! So... you're in a relationship with a ghost?!
Wait a minute... How did you know I'm not wearing any underwear? Aren't you blind?

Hold on... How did you know I'm not wearing any underwear...?
{small}Don't tell me you've been stalking me...
Ha! A better question would be: What don't I like about my body? As a goddess, I have a flawless and divine body. So there.

Well, as a goddess I come from heaven, but recently I've been spending a lot more time in Belzerg. It's a kingdom that has good things for sure, but quite frankly, sometimes it feels like everything is out to get you...
I could tell you about heaven, but the things that would concern a mortal like yourself aren't really that interesting. Just know that it's a pretty boring place when all's said and done.
Yeah, I have. Well, not showers, but I've bathed with pretty much all of my party members before.
Hmm, well, I haven't showered with anyone else before, but I have been in the same bath as my party members before.
A round of applause seems a bit much, don't you think the goddess is more deserving of one? Ah well, I suppose the dealer has been behaving properly with me, so why not.
Yeah, that's... Not fun... {small}Especially when you get left behind intentionally...
Hmm... Okay okay, I admit this is kind of fun. But, don't think I'm going to just take it easy and give up on the game now!
I'm sure you won't be surprised to hear it, but I do fancy Sapphires over most other gems. At least if I'm gonna wear them.
No, Yunyun, it's quite alright! Really! I don't mind playing with you at all! You're a good girl.
Don't worry, Yunyun! You didn't overwhelm me or anything! I'm sorry to hear you struggle with finding a party like that, but don't worry, I'm sure you'll find one soon enough!
Well, I'm not sure if I'd call it my favorite, but I certainly love it when I get to eat some good fried giant toad!
I don't know, Kumatora sounds just fine to me. It's kind of fun to say, actually!
Oh, Kumatora, I don't need any "superpowers", I already have all of the godly powers I could need.
You know, even as a goddess, I'd definitely appreciate the power to never get my clothes dirty as well. Specially when we fight those giant toads...
Obviously, I'd rather be rich and with good health!
What kind of perverted questions are you asking in the presence of a goddess...?
Do you really have to ask that right now, Kumatora...?
Hm, well, while that sounds nice, I definitely prefer to have the freedom of going wherever I please.

What? Demons are allowed?! {small}Hmph, what a lousy place this turned out to be...{!reset}
Very well, but don't try anything funny! I will not hesitate to eliminate you!
What?! What do you mean these stupid demons are allowed in here?! Why didn't anyone tell me sooner?! {small}I better have a serious talk with whoever runs this place later...

state.text: You know what this game needs? This game needs some livening up! And I've got just the thing! Nature's Beauty!

case.state: Uhh... Is anyone going to bring me some bubbly or not? I can see there's drinks already served there, so what gives?
Hmph, well if you're not going to bring me anything to drink you could've at least brought me a snack or something. This place really doesn't know how to treat a goddess.
This place sure has an awful lot of schoolgirls around... {small}I hope the owner isn't another shut-in NEET from Japan...
I'm surprised there's this many people with blue hair around. Normally that's a pretty rare hair color to have...
Hm... I liked it better when I was the only one with blue hair. Now I don't really stand out that much...
Oh dear, just me and this stupid undead? I almost feel a little bad for you.
So, it's just you and me now? My my, how sad. There was a small chance I wouldn't have to humiliate an undead directly, but I guess it was inevitable.
How did you manage to last this long anyway? For an undead, you're surprisingly good. But no matter, an undead is still an undead. You have no chance of beating me.
So then, it's just you and me? You vampires may think you're strong, but trust me, you should just give up right now.
Well well well, looks like you're all that's left standing in my way, vampire. I'm going to enjoy this.
Alright vampire, you put up a good fight, I'll give you that. But I'm a goddess, so I'm going to wipe the floor with you now.
Well, it's just you and me now. You should just hurry up and lose already. Isn't that what you want, anyway?
Honestly, I thought a succubus like you would be the first one out, but I guess luck was on your side, huh? Well, sadly for you, your luck just ran out. I'm going to win this game now.
Hmph, so it's just you now? Don't get any ideas because I'm like this, succubus! I'm still going to beat you no problem!
It's just you and me now, demon. Are you ready to be utterly defeated?
Oh dear, this stupid demon is all that's left? I was hoping for a bit more of a challenge, but oh well.
Don't think I'm about to lose to you now, demon! I'm the great goddess Aqua! I eat schmucks like you for breakfast!
You know, ~undead~, I've been trying to keep count of how many of your wretched kind I've eliminated so far. I wonder if your stupid undead brain can even count that high?

Well, as you can imagine, the list of things I've done as the great goddess I am is quite large, but recently... Heh, not to brag, but thanks to me, three of the Devil King's generals have been defeated.

That said, my achievements don't just end at defeating the Devil King's generals, even if those are the most impressive ones. But I'm a merciful goddess too, I've saved the lives of countless brave adventurers as well! I am an Arch priest after all.

Oh, but my achievements aren't just limited to fighting the Devil King's generals, I've done several other graceful things. For example, in my visit to the city of my followers, Arcanletia, I helped the poor souls who were led astray by that goddess of the padded chest!
Oh yes, and there's also that time I put up a barrier in a cemetery since no one was around to take care of all the yucky spirits there!
My, you're really struggling against me, aren't you? So many losses, and yet here I stand without a single one.
So, just you and me now? Very well, I'll try to not beat you too hard. Keyword being try.
Alright! Looks like it's just you and me now! I've got this game in the bag!
Heh, so it's all come down to this? Well, too bad for you, because I'm definitely going to win now. But I commend you for almost beating a goddess.
Say, Senko, if you're a demigoddess and I'm a goddess, that kind of makes you my junior, doesn't it?

So then, I bet you must be curious about what I do as a goddess, huh? Of course, I'm not just any goddess, you know. In fact, I'm the kind of goddess that guides humans to the afterlife after they die!
Say, are you curious about what kind of amazing things I've done as a goddess? Oh, what am I asking? Of course you are! Hmm... Where to begin...
I gotta say, the decoration this place has is pretty dang good. To whoever did it, you definitely have my sign of approval!
The view from this rooftop is really pretty, don't you think? Heh, I can tell the moon is shining to me, hoping for my victory!
You know, this garden is nice and all, but I think it could use some more flowers.
I wonder if there's any butterflies around here...
Who's this "spnati" guy, anyway? It's kind of weird to not show up to your own birthday party.
Hey uh, not that I don't appreciate the sentiment, but that's not how you spell Aqua.
This sure is a beautiful lake! The water is so clear, I don't think even my purification would change much!
You know, I have a pretty cool skill that I could use on a lake like this! Well, assuming there's fishies here. But I bet there are!
Phew, now I wish I had brought my swimsuit for this! The water looks perfect!
I wonder what these books are about... Ah! Oh, it's just a skull. Who left a skull on the bookshelf?? That's awfully inconsiderate if you ask me!
Say, how come so many of these books don't have titles? Although, in a way I guess it does give them an air of mystery...
Say, is this actually the throne room of any royalty or is it just a really fancy room? Well, there's no one on the throne, so...
Huh... This throne actually looks cooler than the one I sat on while I guided people to the afterlife... When I get back, I totally need to give that thing a remodel!
This place really gives me some bad vibes... I bet some undead creeps are just waiting for the perfect chance to attack! If that happens, get behind me, ~player~! I'll protect you!
Phew, I sure am glad I brought my swimsuit! The water looks perfect!
Unfortunately, thanks to this shut‑in NEET here, I was rudely taken away from my throne in heaven. So, for the time being. I can't do my goddess duties as I did before.
Well, I used to guide humans to the afterlife, but thanks to a certain shut‑in NEET, I'm currently an Arch Priest instead.
Well, I used to guide humans to the afterlife, but thanks to this selfish shut‑in NEET, I'm currently stuck helping him defeat the Devil King instead.
Yes! Thank you, Solar Flare! I'm glad someone gets it! You could learn a thing or two from her, Kazuma!
Of course I'm a goddess! I don't know what you're insinuating, but there's absolutely nothing wrong with my outfit!
Hey! My bikini isn't plain! It has just the perfect amount of detail!
But of course! Worry not, Meia, my followers are the most reasonable followers out there!
Hey!! Who are yo calling Waterworks?! And don't talk about me like I'm some cheap lustful goddess!!
Ah, well... You see... About that... I kiiind of can't do my goddess duties at the moment... So the heavens um... r‑replaced me for now...

A bit of both, I'd say! We deities are simply superior in pretty much every way, but for example, in my case, I am as great and powerful as I am thanks to the unyielding worship I get from all of my faithful followers!
Yeah, I guess it is a little windy out here. Are you feeling cold, Toph?
You think? I dunno, I didn't really think it was particularly drafty in here...
Nope! Just Aqua! Or to be precise, the goddess of water Aqua. I believe that's more than enough, I really shouldn't need any more introduction.
My name doesn't need to be any more official than that! There's only one of me! I am the one and only goddess of water: Aqua!
How dare you?! I am not a puny god in the slightest! And the only reason I lost just now is because you got a little lucky, nothing more!
Big talk coming from someone that's less than decent! If you think an angel like you has any chance of beating me then you're sorely mistaken!
What nonsense are you spouting? You've already lost! And besides, this loss of mine just now means nothing, I'm going to win the game all the same.
Please, don't be ridiculous. You might be cute, sure, but divine? Not even close. I am by far and away the most divine person here.
How dare you?! My followers would never! Their faith and loyalty is second to none! And why should I be impressing you?
Yes! Exactly right, Senko! Finally, someone that recognizes me for who I am!
Hm? Yes, what about it, Senko?
Oh, that's quite simple! I'm here to impress people with my amazing poker skills so they'll join the Axis Order and become my faithful followers!
Oh, what?! How did I lose?! I used Blessing on myself!
Kazuma! How could you let me lose just like that?!

condition.saying: You the goddess of Pisstianity or something?

case.state: How dare you?! I am not the goddess of such a stupid thing! Nor is my name "Baby Blue"! I am the goddess of water, Aqua! But for an insolent fool like yourself, you ought to call me Lady Aqua if you expect to be forgiven!

condition.saying: Should I check the sewage treatment plant?

case.state: I'm not surprised a ruffian like you hasn't heard of me. You would be completely out of place in any of the churches of my followers.

condition.saying: And bigger, and well-spoken, and---not so clumsy.

case.state:
Excuse you! I have no need to be taller, and I am most certainly a perfectly well‑spoken goddess!
...oh, and I'm definitely not clumsy!

condition.saying: Are you still so certain divinity is enough of an advantage?

case.state: O‑Of course it is...! I... may have made a small blunder here and there, but that's not a big deal... {small}I hope...

condition.saying: I guess we're both being proven wrong, aren't we, Aqua?

case.state: W-What?! No! We're... I'm not going to lose this game just because I've been getting a little unlucky! Don't say that...
Waterbender? Well, I'm not sure if you can quite "bend" water, but I can create and manipulate water easily. Obviously, I am the goddess of water, after all.
Well, I don't really do martial arts with water, but as the goddess of water, I can easily create and manipulate water! Lots of it, at that!

condition.saying: I've never met a goddess before

case.state: Oh just shut it already, your crying is annoying. Of course you haven't met a goddess before, you idiot. If you had, you'd already be dead.

state.text: Why you...! What did I tell you about calling me by that name?! I told you I'm Aqua, Aqua! So you better start calling me that!!

case.state: Ah, where to begin? I suppose I might as well get it out of the way early on, for you see, thanks to me, three of the Devil King's generals have already been defeated!
Heh, there's a lot of amazing things I've done, Neptune! But I suppose now would be a good time to mention that thanks to my help, three of the Devil King's generals have been defeated!
Well, the list of things I've done is pretty large. But among the things I've done there's been exorcising the undead, reviving fallen heroes, protecting entire towns... I can keep going if you want.
No, of course not. Having to keep all of that water clean would be a huge pain. But if I had to, I could easily purify any water that I wanted.
Eh, not really. It'd be too bothersome to keep all of that water clean. I could easily purify it if I had to, though.
If it's so confusing to you, why not call me Lady Aqua? I'd say it's a perfectly fitting name!
What?! No!! Of course I'm not! I'm a real goddess!
Well, regardless of what those other gods were like, I assure you I am a real goddess!
Ah, curious, are you? Right, I suppose you humans must wonder about that. The dead actually look exactly as they did while they were alive! So say, if you were to die right now, you'd look like that.

I'm glad you asked! I'd say guiding the dead to the afterlife was a mixture of boring and entertaining at the same time. Most of the people that arrived were pretty normal, but the oddballs could be surprisingly fun! Being thanked for my services was nice as well.
Why yes, Yumeko, yes I did!
I most certainly did, Yumeko! The goddess of water, Aqua!
Absolutely not! I am no less than the goddess of water, in the flesh. Honestly, I don't get how so many people seemingly haven't heard of me.
Yeah?! Well... S‑So can I! Dealing with the undead is as easy as breathing for me!
Heh, my stats are as high as they get! I'm so naturally gifted in fact, they were maxed out the moment I became an adventurer! Well, except for luck and intelligence but those aren't important.
I guess that depends on what you mean by domain. I can tell you I am the goddess of water, and that the city of Arcanletia is the headquarters of my faithful followers of the Axis Order.
W-Well... My party is definitely not weak thanks to me, but... we do have our problems...

Ah, yes I suppose you would be curious about that, Aella. It's pretty simple really, I'm here to impress people with my poker skills so they may join the Axis Order and become my faithful followers! As for seeing me naked, don't worry, that won't be happening.

Oh, I definitely have good reasons for being here: Impressing people with my poker skills so they'll become my faithful followers! Plus, the nature of this game will tap into their carnal desires, which increases my chances of succeeding.

It's quite simple, Yumeko: I'm here to impress you all with my amazing poker skills so you'll join the Axis Order! And if I happen to give you a peek at my divine beauty... Well, all the more reason for you to join!
Oh don't you start to question my goddess‑hood now! Isn't it obvious?
Exist. You have the audacity to exist.
Hah... This again? Give it a rest already. Can't you just understand that you're all horrible and irredeemable? {small}Hm, no, you probably can't understand that actually...
Of course I don't! I'm the goddess of water, damnit! What I play and why I do it is none of your business!!
Are you mocking me, vampire?
Excuse me? Why should I provide proof of my goddess-hood to someone like you? Is it not already obvious I'm a goddess from the way I carry myself?

Hah... You're awfully annoying... What exactly do you want me to do? Use Sacred Create Water on you? Because that's just going to cause too much destruction and I am not putting myself in debt because of you.
Excuse me?! I will give you an opportunity right now to take that back.
Oh you shut your mouth! Just because I got a little unlucky with these stupid cards doesn't mean you have any right to get a big head!
Oh my oh my, what's this? An abhorrent and despicable fake princess spouting garbage again? How sad, don't you ever get tired of being so thoroughly unlikable in every way?
N‑No! Don't say that! I... might have gotten a little unlucky, but that doesn't mean I will lose in the end!
H‑Hey! No! There will be no beating me at all! If I lost this much it's only because of a small streak of bad luck! A small streak doesn't equal to me losing!
H‑Hey! Why are you so happy to see me lose?! This isn't funny at all!
H‑Hey! What the heck is wrong with you?! A goddess is losing! Do you think that's funny or something?!
Honestly, I figured my name would've given it away by now, but I am the goddess of water, Miko.

You may bow if you feel compelled to. I'd certainly appreciate it. But worry not, I might be a goddess, but I know how to have fun too! So, as long as you do treat me with proper respect, you can just see me as the friendly goddess that paid you a visit on this day.
Yes, that is a little odd... Hehe, but I'm sure it's not a big deal. Even my own followers specialize in holy magic rather than water magic!
Hm? What are you calling cosplay, idiot? Are you implying my divine clothes look like a cheap cosplay?
Excuse me? What is that supposed to mean?? Are you saying these clothes look like some cheap cosplay?
Yeah, you better be sorry! Calling my clothes cosplay... Just who do you think you are?!
Hey! Don't you dare lump me with all of those god wannabes! I am the real deal here!
I'll have you know, I most certainly do think that pretending to be a god is extremely arrogant and stupid. Which is why I'm not pretending! I am a goddess!
Well, that's...! Hm... Okay, maybe I've been taking it pretty seriously, but shouldn't I?? I'm a goddess! I can't just let myself lose on a trivial game like this!
Oh yeah, of course I do. That NEET is just one member of our party, there's also our Arch Wizard Megumin and our Crusader Darkness. When I go on quests it's almost always all four of us.
Oh, for sure! For example, I'm the goddess of water! And I've got a junior called Eris, and she's the goddess of fortune. I'm obviously a way better goddess though!
Don't be silly, of course I have a party of friends to go on quests with! There's our Arch Wizard Megumin, our Crusader Darkness, and Kazuma, who's just the regular Adventurer class.
H-Hey!! Stop talking as if though you've already beat me! I-I'm still not out of the game!
H-Hey!! What is it with you?! You and I are definitely not on the same level! And I'm not out of the game yet!!

state.text: Wha---Water wench?! Who do you think are to be calling me by such a name! You take that back! And also, I am not dumb!
Hey! Don't you dare call me by that name! I am Aqua, the goddess of water! And I am not dumb!

case.state: No no, you're a little confused, Solar Flare. I'm the goddess of water, not plants.
Heh, well said, Solar Flare! I can do that and much more!
Okay, Solar Flare... I appreciate it, but I think I'll be the one defending myself from now on.
Yes! Thank you, Solar Flare! I'm glad someone gets it!
A war with zombies, huh? Well, I won't deny that I'm currently busy with the Demon King, but if you still need my help after I'm done with him, maybe I could lend a hand!
Hah?! Excuse you! I don't look like a child at all! My body is absolutely fitting for a beautiful goddess!
Dry bones? Pfft, whatever they are, if they're undead, they'd be doomed if they crossed me.
You shut your mouth, you weird... turtle princess! I just got unlucky! And I look much better than you do!
Is that a challenge? Because I wouldn't mind putting you in your place, Bowsette!
Pfft! Cheep-Cheeps? What kind of ridiculous name is that? I think you're the one that should go play with kiddie things like those!

Ah, interested are you? Among other things, the Axis Order teaches a way of life where you don't allow yourself to be held back by meaningless things! For example, you should eat and drink as much as you want whenever you want!
Ahaha, I don't blame you for being surprised, I doubt many humans could say they've played a game like this with the gods! But yes, I truly am the goddess of water, Aqua.
But of course, Lysithea! I am always a humble goddess! I am completely honest about things at all times.
Hmph, I don't quite like your tone, Reimu, but I'm the goddess of water. And my faithful followers can definitely make money. Quite easily, in fact.
Yep, I'm a goddess! It's not quite a "nation" per se, but my followers do have the city of Arcanletia! And it's a very nice place indeed.
That's right! The goddess of water, to be exact. And I don't exactly have a "nation", but my faithful followers have their headquarters at the beautiful city of Arcanletia!

Ahaha, no no, I'm not like that. That'd be more appropriate for a goddess of the sea. Some of my goddess duties were guiding humans to the afterlife, blessing water for my faithful followers, and dealing with the undead.
Ah, yes, that's just how I am, isn't it? Hah... It's quite nice to hear someone actually praising my divinity.
Oh? Are you interested in becoming one of my followers, Yuno? Hmhm, I'm glad! Ah, you know what I would love? I would love a bottle of some high quality bubbly...
You love being tolerated, hm? Well, it's good to see you know your place. I must say, you sure are good at exposing how pathetic you are.
Is that so? You love it when you're tolerated? Heh, talk about low standards, but I suppose that's fitting for a pathetic demon like you. At least you're smart enough to know your place.
Oh, is that how it is?! You and your demonic family are causing trouble in that city, aren't you?!
So, you have a whole demonic family messing things up over there?! I knew you wretched demons were up to no good!
And why should I believe you? For all I know, you're just going to poison my food.
Uh-huh... What makes you think I'll believe that? A demon like you is probably going to poison the food or something.
Ahaha! What's this all of a sudden, Yuno? You're seriously asking that to a goddess? Hmhm, I do admire your bravery... Well, how about this: Where would you take me if I said yes?
Ahaha! You're really dreaming big, aren't you? Honestly, you might be the first human brave enough to ask me that. Hmm... Well, how about this: Where would you take me if I said yes?
Whatever this "nanotech" can do to produce water, I assure you, the quality won't even remotely compare to what I can do. And for the record, I can do much more than just make water.
H-Hey, do we really have to count this loss...? I um... My good friend Kazuma here can give each of you 10000 Eris if we don't! {small}R‑Right, Kazuma?
H-Hey, do we really have to count this loss...? I um... My good friend Kazuma here can give you 10000 Eris if we don't! {small}R‑Right, Kazuma?
Huh?! What do you mean I lost?! That's ridiculous! Hnngh! I can't be the first to lose like this!
No no no! Please, don't make me lose again! Can't we just not count it?! I'm a goddess!! Hnngh! Please!
H-Huh, what? I actually lost...? But how, I... I was not supposed to...
B-But I've been doing so well this whole time!! How come I actually lost now?! Hwwnghhh...
I lost?! What the heck?! But I used blessing on myself! Didn't you see me use blessing on myself?! This isn't fair!
Remind me to never make any comments about lightning strikes again...
Oh, what?! I already lost last round! How did I lose again?!
This is ridiculous! A goddess of my caliber shouldn't be losing like this!
No!! But I already lost last round! Ugh!! Stupid cards!
Me again? Really? Hah... Of course...

Me again, huh...
(This dealer is probably with the Eris Order...)
I am so done with this game already...
What?! How did I lose three times in a row?! This isn't fair!!
Me again?! Ugh, are you cheating?! You better not be cheating! I really won't forgive you if you are!
I don't know who I angered to deserve this, but I'm sorry ok?! I'm sorry I'm sorry I'm sorry! Just stop making me lose!
Hweengh... Why am I losing so much...? I haven't done anything wrong...!
What's the deal with these stupid cards?! Do they have something against me?!
This is beyond ridiculous!! You have to be cheating! There's no other explanation! And when I prove you are... I'll make you regret it big time!!
Oh well, it was only a matter of time before you got lucky enough.
Seriously? I haven't lost for a bunch of rounds and now I lose? With good cards and everything? This game is stupid sometimes...
Hmph, there goes my streak...
Aaand of course... Alright fine. {small}It was nice while it lasted...
Oh come on!
Luck just couldn't stay on my side for a little longer, could it?
Hah... Why am I not surprised...?
Eh? I‑I lost...? {small}You won't make fun of me, right...?
Heh, this is surprisingly fun! I didn't think I'd end up clashing against a capable goddess like you, ~deity~.
So, you're not holding back, eh? Good good, I was hoping you wouldn't, ~deity~!
Well, I suppose ~deity~ is playing too, so this game might be a bit challenging after all.
Heh, alright. I didn't think anyone here would stand a chance against me, but if ~deity~ is my opponent, I might have to try a little harder than that.
I admit, you are as good as I expected, ~deity~! But we're only just beginning!
Alright alright, you got me again, ~deity~. But I'm not the type to go down without a fight! So you better not lower your guard!
Heh, this is surprisingly fun! I didn't think I'd end up clashing against a capable deity like you, ~deity~.
So, you're not holding back, eh? Good good, I was hoping you wouldn't, ~deity~!
Even after using Blessing... I lost to ~deity~ again, huh...
Hnngh, damnit... I thought for sure I wouldn't lose again after using Blessing... P‑Please don't get any wrong ideas, ~deity~!
Ugh! Damnit! I can't keep losing to ~deity~ like this!!
No! Ugh! I know I am the superior deity, I can't keep losing any more!!
Hm? What do you mean I lost first?! My hand was great!

H-Huh? I lost already? Ahaha... I guess that hand wasn't very good then...
(Damnit, this doesn't make for a good first impression...)
Eh? Why are you looking at me?
I lost?! And I'm the first one to lose, too... Hmph! Fine then, I'm a benevolent goddess, so I’ll let this slide for now.
Haaah?! But why?! I asked nicely! Waaa!!
B-But I trusted you! Hweeh...
Agh!! Damnit, what is wrong with you?! You can't just make a goddess lose like this! It's wrong!
No!! Please, stop counting my losseees! Hwwnghhh! What do you I have to do so you'll stop counting them?! It's not fair!!
Huh, that doesn't seem right... I actually lost again? You're getting awfully lucky... Oh well, lightning doesn't strike the same place twice... {small}Or I guess thrice in this case...
Okay fine, you got me. Don't let it go to your head.
Oh well, unlucky. Happens to anyone I guess. It's not like it'll happen again, anyway.
Alright, I admit you bested me this round! Don't think it'll happen again though!
Tch, again? What a bother.
I lost again, huh... {small}Well, I wasn't really trying...
And looking at the cards... I lost? Seriously...?
I'm starting to think my luck stat might have something to do with my repeated losses...
And... I lost again... Hmm...
So the loser is... me again?! This is getting ridiculous...

I lost again...?
(Damnit, no! I can't just keep losing like this! I'm a goddess! What would my followers think?)
You've got to be kidding... Even after I used blessing on myself...?
Haaah?! What do you mean I lost?! That shouldn't be possible anymore! My luck should be sky high!
W-Wait, this has to be some kind of mistake... I didn't actually lose just now, did I? I really didn't actually lose, right?!
W‑What? What do you mean I lost...? B‑But, my luck should be... Hnnngh...
You will truly stop at nothing to disrobe a goddess, will you?
I'd like to say I'm surprised... But today has just not been my day...
So, that wasn't enough then? Hmph, even after I was so generous...
Your thirst to see me naked truly has no bounds, does it...?

It's not that simple, unfortunately. She might not look like it, but Megumin here can cast some seriously devastating Explosion magic. The problem is that she can only use it once before running out of energy, and the rest of our party doesn't have that much firepower.

Well, to put it simply, I was in the process of reincarnating him into a world that is being subjugated by the Devil King, so he got to choose one cheat item to better his odds of defeating the Devil King. And what does he choose? Me! And the heavens allowed it!
Listen, Noire, I don't know what her deal is and why her parents thought it'd be funny to name her Aqua, but that's just a coincidence! I'm still the one and only goddess of water!
Honestly, I do have my gripes with that. It doesn't feel right for a human to have the name of a deity! Much less mine specifically!
It's not that simple, unfortunately. You see, Kazuma here can be reliable sometimes... But he also happens to be a huge pervert and a NEET.

It's not that simple, unfortunately. She might not look like it, but Megumin here can cast some seriously devastating Explosion magic. The problem is that she can only use it once before running out of energy, and the rest of our party doesn't have that much firepower.
It's not that simple, unfortunately. Darkness here is our crusader, and her defenses are really high. But on the offense... She can't really hit anything with her sword...
Oh, well, her name isn't actually Darkness. It's Lalatina, but she finds her actual name really embarrassing for some reason. I don't get why, it sounds cute to me.
Yeah, you could say that... Except, unlike me, she only knows one spell. Buuut, it also happens to be the most powerful of all destructive magic, Explosion!

state.text: Why am I Aqua 2...? Hmph, so much for that I guess... Very well, I guess I'll start playing for real now.

case.state: It's not that simple, unfortunately. Aside from me, we have our crusader Darkness, the arch wizard Megumin, and Kazuma who's just a normal adventurer. Thing is... Darkness can't hit anything in battle, Megumin only knows how to use Explosion, which is strong but she can only use it once per day. And Kazuma is reliable sometimes, but he's also a shut‑in NEET and a pervert.

Goodness you're annoying... Well, if you must know, your kind has done nothing but wreak havoc on the lands where you dwell! Be it just plain destruction, or robbing humans of their life energy, one way or another, you're nothing but trouble!
Right, uh... In any case, whatever replacement they found can't be as good as me! So, I'm definitely going to get back there as soon as I can!
Hey! It's not disproportionate or devious! It's a perfectly fair system! I deserve all of the prayers I get!
That's ridiculous! How can my own name sound like a human name? Aqua is my name! The name of the goddess of water! It's not my fault some humans think they're funny and name their children after me.
Oh, come on! How am I going to make people more doubtful by rightfully claiming that I am what I am?? What, do you expect me to not say I'm a goddess?
No no, not at all. I'm the only Aqua. But for some reason, people refuse to believe me when I tell them who I am.

Eh? Ah, huh... I guess maybe a little bit... Oh, wait! But that's a good thing! If I cause a commotion people will come to me and recognize my divinity! They'll praise me and they might even give me offerings!

state.text: Yes, I do admit that I've lost more than I had foreseen. But worry not, I have an ace up my sleeve! You see, I haven't actually been giving it my all this whole time!

case.state: What? I'm not cheating! Luck is a skill too! I'm just using my powers to increase it! That's perfectly fair!

condition.saying: Blunders have a way of adding up

state.text: You make a good point, Yumeko! So, I suppose it's about time I took this game seriously...

condition.saying: show us how you'll turn this game around

state.text: Alright, alright... I'll show you, Yumeko. I'll give it my all now!

condition.saying: what if she was a nice goddess?

case.state: If she was a nice goddess then she'd be all the more likely to rid the world of a pest like you.

condition.saying: mean goddess.

case.state: Of course not! Any self‑respecting goddess wouldn't think twice about getting rid of a pest like you!
You know, funny that you say that, but I do think it has been surprisingly fun to be away from the heavens sometimes. I'm definitely going back there though!

state.text: You know, funny that you say that, but I do think it has been surprisingly fun to be away from the heavens sometimes. That said... I've been losing a little too much for my liking. So I'm gonna give it my all now.

case.state: Oh, is that so? I didn't know you were a mortician. But, I guess you do look like one.

state.text: Oh, is that so? I didn't know you were a mortician. But, I guess you do look like one. Anyway, I'm sorry to say, but I can't allow myself to keep losing like this. So, I'll be playing seriously now.

case.state: Oh please, isn't it obvious? I'm the goddess of water! Doesn't my appearance give it away?
Come now, Jura, can't you tell who I am? You really oughta pay more attention, I'm Aqua! The goddess of water! Honestly, it should've been obvious.
I am most certainly not some feeble "river goddess"! I am the Aqua! The goddess of water! And don't you forget it!
Of course I'm sure! I'm me! And I know full well that I am the one and only goddess of all water, Aqua! So don't you go saying anything ridiculous like that!
It's good to see you understand how special this opportunity truly is! Honestly, too many people seem to question my goddess‑hood around here.
I'm glad you think so! It's not every day that you have the privilege of playing with a beautiful goddess such as myself.
I should! But for some reason most people don't respect me at all! And they seem to respect my junior much more! It's ridiculous! What does Eris have that I don't??
Of course we do! But, I'm already all‑knowing and wise, so I don't need some silly intelligence stat to be high.

It's not that simple, unfortunately. Aside from me, we have our crusader Darkness, the arch wizard Megumin, and Kazuma who's just a normal adventurer. Thing is... Darkness can't hit anything in battle, Megumin only knows how to use Explosion, which is strong but she can only use it once per day. And Kazuma is reliable sometimes, but he's also a shut‑in NEET and a pervert.
Unfortunately not... We also have an arch wizard and a normal adventurer, but one of them is obsessed with explosion magic while the other one is a pervert and a NEET...

state.text: Ah, but that's because I haven't been trying at all this whole time! You see, I'm going to play for real now...

case.state: But of course! You should expect no less from a goddess of my caliber! And you're welcome to join the Axis Order if you so wish! All you have to do is ask!
Well, duh! A goddess like myself wouldn't go through with a plan if it wasn't good! That aside, if you wish to become one of my followers, just let me know and I can give you the sign up sheet!
Yeah, that's my holy aura at work. Serves you right for daring to show up in the first place.

Goodness you're annoying... Well, if you must know, your kind has done nothing but wreak havoc on the lands where you dwell! Be it just plain destruction, or robbing humans of their life energy, one way or another, you're nothing but trouble!

state.text: You're hopelessly optimistic if you really think that. But either way, I've had enough of losing in this game. I'm going to take things seriously now.

case.state: Don't you dare insinuate even for a second that I'm a perverted goddess! The reasons my divine self is here today are not something you deserve to know, end of discussion.
Don't you get smart with me, vampire! This loss means nothing to the likes of me!
Unlike you, I actually have good reasons to praise myself and act important. A goddess and a snotty nobody like you are like day and night.
I am not a fraud! Just because I don't want to act like a mindless barbarian doesn't mean I don't have the power of a goddess!
Yes, I'm sure a pervert like you would love that. But sadly for you, that's absolutely not happening.
Well, miss "princess", I can live with myself just fine because I'm not an insufferable joke of a princess. But I understand if you can't even begin to picture what that's like.

Oh yes, I'm sooo sure everyone is beneath you. Please! You're getting more pathetic by the minute! You're a nobody! The only people that would give you a passing glance are whatever utter fools you have for servants, if you even have those!
Surprised? I don't blame you, few people can truly attest to having met a goddess in person. But that's just how great I am!
Something important? Hmm, I didn't forget my hair clip... I wasn't planning on bringing my staff... No, I don't think I'm missing anything!
Revealing? You mean like my cards? Hmm... Well, I'm not wearing any glasses that could reflect my cards so, I don't think so!
I mean exactly what I said! I'm a goddess! There's no way to misinterpret it!
No, nothing like that. I just use Create Water! Or Sacred Create Water when things get serious. It's really no big deal for me.
Hah... Fine, I guess I can accept that excuse. Since I have to tolerate you with this place's rules and all...
Hmph, a poor excuse, but I'll accept it. I still can't believe this place allows you demons to be around... Tolerating you is such a bother...
Oh yes, there's one very good thing you could do. You could get out of my sight.
Oh, definitely! There is something very special you could do to make things right. Get out of here.
That's ridiculous! A goddess like me not being above others... There's just no way that's true!
Preposterous! The gods are superior to humans in every way! Luck can be no different! It just can't!
Don't be stupid! The difference between gods and humans is massive! Luck is no different in this regard!
You're wrong! Gods are absolutely superior! In luck or anything else, we are better than humans!
But...! Even if it's trivial, I can't just give up! I have to win! A goddess always wins!

state.text: You bet I do! I mean, sometimes the adventures aren't very fun, like when they involve giant toads... But there's some fun ones here and there! That said... I have been losing a bit too much in this little game...
Well, I do wish most of our adventures were more fun than chaotic, and with way less giant toads, but I guess it's not the worst. Anyway, I'm sorry, but I kind of have to play for real now.

case.state: Absolutely not! I am not depraved in the slightest! I am here for entirely pure reasons! All I want is to demonstrate my abilities in this card game so you'll all be impressed and join the Axis Order!
Y-You... what on Earth are you?! Are you seriously human?!
Y-You... are you really human?! You act more like a monster...!
No, that's not how it works at all! I will admit that you're beautiful, that does not make you a goddess! Deities like me are on a way different level than you humans!
Don't be ridiculous, that's completely different! I won't deny that you posses great beauty, but that doesn't make you a goddess! The difference between gods and humans is far greater!
Well, you've got to be living in some kind of alternate dimension where I don't exist, because I would not let that happen.
That can't be right... I think you're probably from some freak alternate dimension where I'm not around, because I would never let things get that bad!
Don't you get snarky with me, human! I may be a nice goddess now, but you don't want to get on my bad side!
Quit it with that sassiness, human! Hmph... I'm being nice and all, but you don't want to make me angry!
Ah... I... I guess you could say that... It wasn't willingly, mind you, but... Yeah, someone else is doing the "guiding humans to the afterlife" thing right now.

state.text: Of course! It all fits perfectly because it should fit perfectly! And on the topic of my image as a goddess... I'm afraid I can't be so lax about this game anymore.

case.state: Ah, you might know it by its other name, champagne. I am asking for high quality champagne, Yuno.
Oi, what are trying to say about my faithful followers? You better not be mocking the Axis Order!

state.text: Oi, what are trying to say about my faithful followers? Hmph, you better not be mocking the Axis Order... I guess it's about time I started to take this game seriously.

case.state: I'm glad to hear that! After all, I love to have fun too! I'm actually quite good at being the life of the party, you know?

state.text: I'm glad to hear that! After all, I love to have fun too! I'm actually quite good at being the life the party. Although, right now... I am playing to win. So, I'm going to give it my all now.

case.state: Hah? Excuse you, I don't need to do some silly "bluffing" to win! Just you wait and see!

state.text: Oh ho, is that so? Well then, I have a solution for that. I'll just remove the need to bluff altogether!

case.state: Yes, that's right! I'm glad you understand. A goddess of my caliber deserves nothing but the best!
What kind of goddess do you take me for? I wouldn't do something like that! My followers put their faith in me because of how great I am, plain and simple!
Alright, I've had enough of this foolishness. I can't let myself lose to the likes of you.
Hmph, I suppose you've done well so far considering what you are, but I'm done playing around.
To think I'd have to show my chest to a wretched fiend like you...
Don't get any funny ideas! I'm just doing this because I'm a civilized goddess that follows the rules!
Just for the record, your wretched kind does not deserve this sight, luck just happened to be on your side for now!
I'm doing it, but don't think even for a second I'm letting this defeat fly by unpunished!
Come on, there has to be some kind of special set of rules for goddesses!
I'll take off the rest of my bikini now, but this is where it ends!
Fine, I'll take it off! But this is absolutely my last loss!
Fine, I suppose even I can get a bit unlucky sometimes. I shall remove my sandals then.
Isn't it impressive how a simple pair of sandals like these can look so much better when it's being worn by a goddess?
These might not be a magic item of any kind, but they are my sandals, which means they're more important than pretty much all other sandals out there.
Allow me to get a bit more comfortable then. The goddess of water doesn't need these for exploring the sparkling seas.
Isn't it impressive how a simple pair of sandals can look so much better when it's being worn by a goddess?
These might not be a magic item of any kind, but they are my sandals, which means they're more important than pretty much all other sandals out there.
Oh well, I guess it's not that big of a deal. It's not like you would actually make a goddess lose, right?
Eh, I guess it can't be helped. I'll take off my flower now.
In any case, I'm not the kind of goddess that would get worked up over losing twice. I mean, that would just be silly, right?
Oh well, I'll just take this off now. This beautiful flower proudly displays the symbol of the Axis Order. Make sure it stays just as spotless as I'm leaving it right now.
Very well, I guess it was foolish of me to think I could just beat another deity without giving it my all...
Alright, ~deity~, clearly I have to give it all I've got if I want to truly prove which of us is the best deity! So prepare yourself...
I'll take off my skirt now, but this is were it ends!
Fine, I'll take it off! But this is absolutely my last loss!
Hmph, very well. I suppose I can get down to your level. But just because I'm feeling nice.
Fine, I suppose even I can get a bit unlucky sometimes. I shall remove my boots then.
Hah... Fine, I guess I can spare a bit more of my endless generosity...
Honestly, what am I going to do with you? Normally, a goddess of my caliber would never show off anywhere close to this much, but you know what? Today I am feeling extra generous.
It's unacceptable that I, a goddess, am being put in this position. You better not let this keep happening, you got it?!

state.text: Hmph, whatever. I don't need the help of some stupid cards to win, I can win all on my own.
Alright, clearly I can't rely on those good‑for‑nothing cards if I want to win. So I'll just have to try for real now.

case.state: You're mean, you know that? You're really mean to goddesses.
Don't you have any idea of how screwed up it is to make a goddess undress for you?! Have even stopped to consider that doing this makes you all degenerates?! Well, have you?!
I guess that's enough playing around then. You might've gotten lucky up until now, but I'm gonna give it my all now...
Alright alright, listen, this has been fun and all, but I can't just let you beat a goddess in a game like this...
You've done a pretty decent job to make me lose this much, honestly. But I'm not about to let my status as a goddess be tarnished in something this trivial...
Well, while I'm at it, any comments on my boots? It's okay, I understand if you're speechless at their beauty. A goddess wears nothing but the best of the best.
Make sure you take good care of these boots, okay? They're pretty much divine relics, so it'd be in your best interest to do so.
Obviously, these boots are really pretty, being mine and all, but even I have to admit that it's tiresome to wear them all day. So really, I'm just getting a bit more comfortable here.
You should appreciate the craftsmanship on these boots before I take them off, you know? They're quite literally divine!
You know, these are the same boots I've worn to most of my adventures! Considering they're mine, I bet I left the ground I stepped on cleaner than before.
Oh well, I guess it's not that big of a deal. It's not like you would actually make a goddess lose, right?
Eh, I guess it can't be helped. I'll take off my socks now.
In any case, I'm not the kind of goddess that would get worked up over losing twice. I mean, that would just be silly, right?
Oh well, I'll just take these off now. Just like my boots, these socks are made out of the finest materials, so treat them with care, alright?
Oh well, I'll just take my socks off then. These are also pretty much divine relics, so make sure you don't stain them or anything.
Hah... Very well, I understand. Really, I do.
Jeez, you really are determined to see me naked, aren't you?
Hah... I guess there's really no helping it... You just can't control your urges upon being in my presence, can you?
Honestly... I knew you'd be determined to see the nude body of a goddess, but I didn't think you'd be so determined you'd actually be able to beat me again...
Very well then, I suppose you did earn this to some extent...
Alright, if you're truly so desperate to see all of me, I have no other choice but to show you the full extent of my divine beauty...
Oh well, if you want to be dazzled by my nude body so badly, then dazzled you shall be!
My name being Aqua has no relation to this whatsoever. I simply chose to not wear anything out of comfort.
Keep talking, you arrogant royal trash. We'll see who gets the last laugh in the end.
Big talk from an arrogant fool that already lost. Just you watch, I'll win like this no problem.
It just really gets on my nerves... I mean, come on! I'm the spitting image of... well, myself!
Don't be silly, of course it is! If you live your whole life worrying about the little details, you'll never get to enjoy anything.
Oh well, that would be cheating, obviously.
How dare you?! I am most definitely not a goddess of lust! I'm the goddess of water! Was my name not enough of a giveaway??
Absolutely not!! I am the goddess of water!! I have never been a goddess of any kind of lust!
How insolent! I am not a goddess of lust! I simply find it more comfortable to not wear such things!
Well, yes, but that's not a problem for me. I mean, do you really think I'm gonna lose again?
I guess you could say that, but it's not like I should worry about that. There's no way I'm losing again.
Okay, well... Enough of this pointless talk! A goddess of my caliber doesn't need high intelligence or luck stats to be as great as I am!
It'd be like trying to patch a hole with a band‑aid. My powers as goddess are obviously incredible, but when it comes to people, I can't fix them as easily.
Honestly, I have no idea how Darkness manages to be so hopelessly inaccurate...
Honestly, all things considered, I guess Kazuma isn't that bad. When push comes to shove, he's usually someone you can rely on. And it's usually his plans that let us win in the end.

The problem isn't that, the problem is that she actually drains all of her energy with a single Explosion. In the past, we have given her part of someone else's energy so she could use Explosion again, but that takes time, and we might not always be able to do it.
Why wouldn't I be mad at you?! You shouldn't even have the right to exist! I despise all of your wretched kind! You're all rotten to the core!

Uh-huh... Listen, clearly you're either an idiot or your parents are hiding it from you, but your kind is nothing but scum on this world. Don't go thinking there's any "good ones" out there, because there are none.

Of course I am! Unlike you disgusting succubi, my beauty is holy and natural. If I'm showing it here right now it's because I'm feeling generous enough to grace this table with the sight of my body in its full glory.
Oh just shut up already!! You're ruining my moment!!
Yes, I'm sure you and whatever fools you have for subjects must have it so much easier compared to the literal goddess. Honestly, it's no wonder a plebeian like you would question my status as one.
Don't be stupid, of course I have graceful powers like that. But quite frankly, I'm not sure you are deserving of seeing them.

Yes yes, thank you for explaining to us why you're so pathetic, "princess". But next time, don't mix me up with yourself. It's not a good look for a goddess to get confused with good‑for‑nothing fools like you.
Oh, that's quite alright. I'm sure that by the time we're done you'll change your mind!
Yeah yeah, that's what most people say at first. But don't worry, I'm sure you'll change your mind soon enough.
Oh, that's what you meant? That's nothing to worry about then. I don't wear that stuff. I have no need to.
Pfft! Ahahaha! Is that what you were so worked up about? You humans stress over underwear so much. I know I'm not wearing any, so what?
I'm not sure about the validity of this heartbeat thing, but I am most certainly not lying!
I just told you, with Create Water. As the goddess of water, I can use any water magic without issue. {small}Well, unless it was demonic water magic or something.
Ah! N-No, that's...! That's not... true... The gods are... I mean, we are superior! {small}We... have to be...
W-What?! I'm... No no, there's no way I am proving something like that... That... {small}That can't be...
N-No! Shut up! That's... That's not gonna happen! Hnngh, I'm a goddess! I can't end up like you!
S-Shut up! There's just... There's no way that can happen! Hnngh... I can't allow myself to be reduced to your level! I just can't!
Don't push your luck, demon! I'm tolerating you out of the goodness of my heart! If I wanted to, I could deal with you very easily!
Don't get ahead of yourself, you insolent demon! Being tolerated is more than what you deserve, so it'd be in your best interest to not provoke me!
I'll pass on that. I doubt someone like you could cook anything good without burning it.
With how clumsy and dumb you look, I highly doubt your cooking would be worth any of my time.
Tama City, huh... I see, so that place is full of demons... I better make a note of that.
So, this Tama City is safe for your wretched kind... I see, I better make a note of that.
I suppose you could say that. In my opinion, there should be no contest! Specially since Eris pads her chest! That is simply unforgivable!
That's... Ugh, I can't really get mad at you when you're saying it like that... I guess I could try to loosen up a bit... {small}But, I still plan to win.
You humans tend to care so much about names, but I've never had any problems with mine. Not to mention, you can change your names. I'm surprised you don't do it more often.
Yeah, fire powers can do that to you... That's why I am perfectly content with sticking to my water magic.
I...! That's... Hmph, that's none of your business!
Now now, you're making a lot of assumptions there! I am not showing my privates to anyone! Because there's no way I'm losing enough for that!
H-Hey! Stop laughing! What's wrong with you?! You're seriously creeping me out!
Hmph, you're pretty cheeky for a shrine maiden...
Thanks, Mitama! But a goddess doesn't need luck! I'm definitely going to do it!
Hah... It would seem that way, Mitama... {small}Unfortunately...
Ahaha, y‑yeah, that's... not very nice, to say the least...
Hmm... Sure, why not? I won't say no to that. But I hope you won't buy something that's too cheap, yes? I am a goddess, after all.
Enjoy your victory while you can, I'm going to make you regret messing with me.
Yeah yeah, I've bared my chest! Laugh if you want! I'm still going to beat you to the ground!
There, now you've seen me naked. {small}Stupid freaking game...
There! Now you can see all of my body. Happy? You should be, because I'll make sure it's your last chance to be happy for a very long time...
There isn't?! Well why not?! Grrr! Get to it then! Make rules fit for a goddess like me! You should treat me properly damnit!
Honestly, can I be any more gracious for following the rules of this little game? You should sing my praises right about now.
And there you go, even gods can bleed. Although this is a paper cut more than anything. Now I'm going to go on a full winning streak!
And there, see? I'm playing along too. Of course, I'm not going to lose any more after this, but you obviously expect as much from a goddess, right?
I will beat you, ~deity~! Mark my words!
Don't think you've proven anything, ~deity~! Nude or not, I will beat you!
Don't think you suddenly stand a chance because of this! The likelihood of me losing again is pretty much nonexistent!

You were just dying to see these, weren't you? Of course, of course, I sometimes forget I posses the beauty of a goddess. Very well then, I guess I'll humor you this time. It's not like you'll be able to focus on the game from now on...
Hmhmhm~ Ah, whatever shall I do with you? I'm really quite impressed by how big your desire to undress me is. I guess that's just how it is when you see a goddess as beautiful as me, hm?
Dumb stupid cards, I'll show you what I can do!
Just you watch! I'm bringing this game back right now!
