So you're a robot, huh? Well, you don't seem anything like those creepy robot‑maids that weirdo built, so we're off to a good start!
(I really hope this one doesn't suddenly pull out a whip or something...)
Well, you are an undead. We couldn't really expect much better from you.
Really showing off your undead brain there, aren't you?
Pfft, hahaha! Seriously, what kind of undead thinks they could be even semi decent at this?
Oh no, the poor stupid undead lost again, what a shocker.
I'd feel bad for you, but it serves you right for showing your ugly undead face around here.
Too tough to read the cards with that undead brain of yours?
Maybe you should try to grow a brain.
You can start to actually try anytime, ~target~. Oh wait, that's too much for you, isn't it?
My, I wasn't expecting much from you, but this is seriously pathetic.
Don't feel bad, the gap between you and I is simply too great.
Oh my oh my, what's this? You lost again? It's almost like you're playing against a goddess or something...
Get ready, this is going to become a trend.
I'd tell you to get on my level, but that's definitely impossible for a lowly creature like you.
If you feel like crying, go ahead. It'd be music to my ears.
Ha! Take that, ~target~!
This won't be the last, just saying.
Oh no, now we'll have to see you take something off. What a shame. For us, that is.
Hah... It's almost too fun to stomp insects like you. Almost.
~Target~ lost? Oh, I feel sooo bad... Heh, not.
Someone like you never stood a chance against me!
I'll beat you however many times it takes, ~target~! You're going down!
Did you ever stand a chance? No. Is it hilarious that you're trying anyway? Absolutely.
Ah, seeing creatures like you fail has to be one of life's greatest pleasures.
As a goddess, it's my job to put impudent creatures like you in their place.
~Target~ lost? Oh, I feel sooo bad... Heh, not.
Ah, seeing creatures like you fail has to be one of life's greatest pleasures.
Serves you right!
I can't believe you somehow managed to outlast me...
Hmm... {small}How did that stupid ~target~ even beat me...?
Knowing that you're still in the game almost feels criminal.
For the record, I would've totally crushed you if it wasn't for dumb luck!
I believe it would be quite easy if you simply called me Lady Aqua, as I am a goddess.
So then, ~target~, what kind of deity do you pray to? Have you ever considered converting to a different church? The church of Axis is a pretty good alternative if so!
Say, how good are you at dealing with the undead, ~target~? Pretty good, I hope? Well, not that it matters right now, I can handle any undead no prob!
Hey, you're an adventurer right? Is your party strong? Maybe strong enough to beat the Devil King? 'Cause if so, you might just have the best Arch priest in the world join you!
If your mind is full of nothing but lewd thoughts, you're bound to keep losing, you know?
I feel like this isn't really a loss for someone like you...
You know, I was expecting to find perverted people in here, but aren't you a little too shameless?
Must be real easy to be a pervert in a game like this, huh...
Pfft! Okay okay, I know I said I wouldn't make fun of you... but that's just pathetic!
Don't feel bad, the gap between you and I is simply too great.
Don't feel too bad, having bad luck isn't something you can control most of the time.
Well, it was inevitable that you'd do poorly against me. Really, it's not your fault I'm this good.
There there, unlucky streaks just happen sometimes. Especially when you're playing against divine beings, but that's neither here nor there.
I won't break my promise, but you really should've known you couldn't beat me.
Oh my oh my, what's this? You lost again? It's almost like you're playing against a goddess or something...
Get ready, this is going to become a trend.
You know, they say that "Sometimes running away is winning". Maybe you should try that before it's too late.
I'd tell you to get on my level, but that's definitely impossible.
It'd be pretty great if you kept losing like this.
You know, deities appreciate it when you lose in their place!
It was awfully callous of you to make me undress this much, so don't you start complaining about bad luck now!
Oh come on! Why couldn't you lose like this when I was still in the game?!
You just had to wait until after I lost...
Haaah! Why are you losing so much now?! This isn't fair!!
How did end up losing to the likes of you...?
This is seriously way too humiliating...
Hah... What would my followers think...? A goddess shouldn't be in a position like this...!
You... weren't intentionally waiting until I lost before you started to lose yourself... Right...?
It would've been really helpful if you played like this earlier...
Pfft, is that the best you can do? You should really try harder against me.
My, are you even trying?
If you want to stand even the slightest of chances against me, you need to avoid hands like those.
Pfft! That's your hand? You're really not going to beat me anytime soon.
You do realize you want to have at least two matching cards, right?
How come you get to be so lucky after I lost?? Hnngh! This isn't fair! You should've given me those wins instead!
That was... too close...
Phew... With that hand, I was starting to think I might actually... N‑Never mind.
Hmm... That was awfully close... I really don't like these close calls...
Hey! I almost lost just now, dealer! You really should get your act together!
Alright! Even with a terrible hand like that, Aqua prevails! That's just how great we gods are!
Ah, I can't help but win even when my cards are less than excellent. Truly, this isn't a fair fight for you, my apologies.
Oh! I actually won! I thought for sure I would lose with those cards...
Sweet! I was just about ready to strip, but I guess I was worrying over nothing!
Never underestimate a goddess!
Oh! Yeah, I didn't lose! It's working perfectly after all!
...hm? Oh, sorry, I got so used to winning that I just wasn't paying attention.
Beating tough quests is nice, but it's also nice to effortlessly complete easy quests. And I gotta say, this game has reminded me more of the latter.
Was the sight of my bosom that distracting? Oh well, who could blame you?
Too difficult to concentrate now? Don't worry, it's only natural.
My, ~target~, it seems you lost. You should play more carefully next time. Oh wait, that's right, that won't help you against a goddess. My bad.
Yes! I had a feeling I was going to win that round! Err, I mean... I'm going to win every time...! O‑Obviously...
You know, I'm actually ranked above the goddess of luck. So really, if you think about it, there's no chance you can win against me in this kind of game.
Hey, there's no shame in giving up right now. After all, you shouldn't waste your time on impossible things, and beating me is clearly impossible.
Oh, ~target~ lost? Well hey, you're doing a good deed! You lost in my place after all.
So, ~target~ lost? Alright then, strip with no doubts! You'll probably regret whatever choice you make if you think about it too much, so just do it!
Great! If I can keep up this pace, I can totally win! No, I am going to win!
Heh, I've still got it. No, actually... I never lost it!
Maybe I should just stop looking at my cards now, my luck might be too high for me to get any challenge out of this.
So, ~target~ lost? Hey hey, ~target~! What do you think? Aren't my poker skills just amazing? Even though I'm almost out of the game, I won! You should praise me!
Hm, maybe we should get a praise jar so that you can compliment me every time I win. It'd have to be pretty big, though!
What, you think I'm mad because I lost? Oh no, I'm doing perfectly fine! You just carry on with your stupid card game!
You're just going to take off your ~clothing~, aren't you?
Oh, just ~target.ifmale(his|her)~ ~clothing~. How... nice...
Just twist the knife, why don't you...
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ all you're taking off... ~clothing.ifPlural(are they|is it)~?
Knowing your kind, ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ probably ~clothing.ifPlural(have|has)~ some kind of curse on ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~...
Take off whatever you want, it doesn't make a difference to me. The outcome of this game will be the same.
Not ~clothing.ifPlural(the most|a very)~ interesting ~clothing~, but we can't really expect much more from you.
So, just your ~clothing~, ~target~? I guess it's better than nothing... {small}~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ sure ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ ugly...
My, ~clothing.ifPlural(those would be some|that'd be a)~ nice ~clothing~ if ~clothing.ifPlural(they weren't|it wasn't)~ wasted on a creature like you.
Just ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, huh...
You're just going to take off your ~clothing~, aren't you?
Oh, just ~target.ifmale(his|her)~ ~clothing~. How... nice...
Just twist the knife, why don't you...
~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ all you're taking off... ~clothing.ifPlural(are they|is it)~?
Knowing your kind, ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ probably ~clothing.ifPlural(have|has)~ some kind of curse on ~clothing.ifPlural(them|it)~...
Take off whatever you want, it doesn't make a difference to me. The outcome of this game will be the same.
Not ~clothing.ifPlural(the most|a very)~ interesting ~clothing~, but we can't really expect much more from you.
So, just your ~clothing~, ~target~? I guess it's better than nothing... {small}~clothing.ifPlural(Those|That)~ ~clothing~ sure ~clothing.ifPlural(were|was)~ ugly...
My, ~clothing.ifPlural(those would be some|that'd be a)~ nice ~clothing~ if ~clothing.ifPlural(they weren't|it wasn't)~ wasted on a creature like you.
Just ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~, huh...
Oh joy, now we'll have to see more of your hideous body...
Progress is progress, but I really don't want to see ~target~ any more naked...
I wish we could skip this part with you...
I guess this was inevitable...
Tch, how bothersome... Now I'll to deal with ~target~ with ~target.ifmale(his|her)~ ~clothing~ off...
I think that having to deal with looking at your face was already more than enough...
Wha---Hey!! Watch where you're going!
Ah! Hey, don't fly around like that! You almost hit me!!
For your information, wearing no underwear is simply more comfortable! You humans are so hung up on embarrassment that you just can't realize that.
She's a crusader that uses melee attacks with her sword, and... Sadly, she definitely has trained... I'm not quite sure how she manages to so expertly miss everything she swings at...

Oh, I'm talking about a party member of mine, and he's a real piece of work... I mean, firstly, it's his fault I was taken away from heaven! But even after bringing me along on his adventure to defeat the Devil King against my will, what does he do? He is totally ungrateful for my gracious help and he even calls me useless! Can you believe it??

I thought it'd be obvious, but I'm talking about this shut‑in NEET here. Believe it or not, this guy is the reason I'm not in heaven right now. {small}And he's awfully ungrateful for my gracious help too...
That so? Hmph, mentalities like those are what leads some fools to use pads... I also can't believe a goddess would become a hikikomori...

That so? Hmph, mentalities like those are what leads some fools to use pads... I also can't believe a goddess would become a hikikomori... I'd expect that from this shut‑in NEET, but a goddess? It just doesn't seem right...
No, there's not really anything wrong with it. It shows a lot of skin, but I guess it makes sense considering where we're playing.
Oh no, nothing's wrong with it. I was just wondering if you were showing off so much skin on purpose, but considering where we're playing, it makes sense.
Stop calling me that! I'm a goddess, not a wench!! And I said elemental spirit, you idiot!
Again?!

condition.said: I'm sure you wouldn't say that if you knew me well!

case.state: Don't be ridiculous. I don't need to know anything about you to be able to tell how pathetic you are.

condition.said: What'd I ever do to you! Y-You barely know me!

case.state: I know enough. You're a demon, and you look pathetic. A goddess doesn't need to waste any more of her time analyzing your kind.

condition.said: Though it's more of a hobby than anything

case.state: A... hobby? Really? I suppose some adventurers just enjoy going on quests, huh... Even so, I would've thought the reward money was the real incentive...
I see, that does sound---Wait... Worlds? You can travel through different worlds?!

state.text: HEY!! Who are you calling a water wench?! I'm the goddess of water, you insolent fool! I demand that you take that back right now!

case.state: Ugh...
(Well, maybe she's just a weirdo. But I'll keep my eye on her...)
(Well, maybe she's just a weirdo. But I'll keep my eye on her...)
(Hmm... But is there any way to prove that she's a zombie? Knowing them, she's probably not going to let me try using Turn Undead on her.... Hm, is she saying something...?)
That skin... Don't tell me...
Hey, with how you've cheated in the past, it's a fair question.
Yeah, like those gloves!
Right, exactly! So you can just take off your gloves for now!
(Then again... I don't think I could picture Megumin as Megumin if she didn't dress up like she does.)
There's nothing wrong with over the top! And hey, your Explosion magic is absolutely top‑notch! So I think you can get away with it.
Say, you're not hiding your cat under that hat, are you? Since right now there's no one to take care of her back home I mean...
I see... Well, if you're okay with that, I hope you have fun at least.
So you can handle it? Alright then, still though, don't push yourself too hard.
Why not? I think it's a cute name! Lalatina has a nice ring to it!
Ah, I see. So you came here to play just like me. I'm still surprised you'd pick a place like this though, you never struck me as the type to...
Huh? You don't? Then how come you're saying you're "Aqua's Grunt"?
You don't know me? But if you don't know me, why are you calling yourself "Aqua's Grunt"?
I see, so that's one of the reasons why people come here... You want to get naked with strangers.
Fighting, huh... Alright, I won't press you for details on that. I suppose you could say I'm here for similar reasons considering all of the questing I've done with my party.

Tremendous power against creatures of darkness? Well well, now you've definitely got my attention! Would you be interested in joining my party for a quest or two? You'd get the chance to go on a quest with a real goddess!
Any seal or lock? Really now... Actually... Would that Keyblade work on a barrier too?
A goddess performing as an idol? You know, that's actually not a bad idea! I could totally become an insanely popular idol and convert many people to the Axis Church!
Really now? What about your duties as a goddess? Don't tell me you're slacking off on your goddess work to be an idol...
I see, so you can do fire magic? Curious, I wouldn't have expected someone with your looks to be a fire goddess. Although, I suppose blue fire is the hottest...
Right, a goddess in general... So basically, you're saying you don't stand out in any areas.
Excuse me?! How dare you speak that way to me! I don't know who you are, but I don't care! You have no excuse to treat a goddess of my caliber with such disrespect!
Arcana Slave? That sounds pretty dangerous... But if you're using it to blast away evil beings...
Healing spells and powerful beams? You have quite the repertoire then... How did you manage to learn those spells?
Ah, I see! It's quite rare to come by people with such a genuine strong sense of justice. I sure hope you continue to cleanse the world from such wretchedness.
That's great! Nowadays it's almost impossible to have genuine heroes with a sense of justice like yours! With you around, I'm sure the world will be a better place soon enough!
You can't remember? I didn't realize you were struggling with something like that... I suppose fighting selflessly for justice isn't without its sacrifices...
Oh, so you can't remember? I'm sorry to hear that... I guess being a brave fighter of justice can have its drawbacks too...
Aw, that's cute! Are you close with your mother?
I get what you mean. Sometimes even I can forget things, and I'm a goddess. But in any case, I do think your ability to compose haiku is nice. I bet it also helps you with having a varied vocabulary!
So it came with the outfit... But, why would a shrine maiden need to have armor included in her clothes?
Hey now... What are you trying to imply with that?
Wha---Hey! I am not being humbled by luck! A goddess has no need to be humbled!
Hmph! Just because you happened to beat me doesn't mean I was humbled by anyone! Luck is simply a scam!
A sword? Then... this was some kind of heroic sacrifice?
A sword you say? Oh my... {smaller}Don't tell me you lost your arm...
Ah, a healer that packs a punch too, huh? Then that's one thing we have in common! Although my healing abilities are superb, I of course, am no slacker in the offensive department.
Ah hah, a healer that can fight I see! That makes two of us then. My healing abilities may be top notch, but I can also fight with all the might of a goddess!
A-Ah, yes... I... I see. I think I got... some of that...
Ehhh... Why go through the trouble of guarding a lighthouse? Is it really that special?
Ehhh... Really now... That's odd, I was pretty sure no human could survive on Mercury...
Wow! All that power from little critters like those? Size can be really deceiving...
Hm, yes I definitely wouldn't want to swim in icy waters myself... Hot springs are far more relaxing... Say, where did Fizz go?
My my! That's quite impressive indeed... You know, having the help of someone like you could come in handy for my party when we go on quests!
I see... Are you guys a beginner party or are you more of an advanced party?
Hopefully it stays that way...
Wha---No!! Of course not! I just got unlucky! Isn't it obvious?!
Pfft! As if a fiend like you deserves even an ounce of courtesy!
Good parts? The only good part is the one where you leave, which is why I suggested you do so just now.
Don't be ridiculous, ~player~ is an actually decent human being. There's no way he'd take interested in a fiend like you.
No, seriously, did you hit your head as a kid?
Then why are you about to take off your bra right now?
A likely story! Why should I believe you?!
It absolutely is! Who would want to see a horrible creature like you naked?!

The only lost cause here is you. You're clearly an impressionable and delusional fool.
...wait, taking that into account... You might have gotten cursed by some kind of demon...
Yes yes, I'm sure. But before talking so high and mighty of yourself, you should try becoming an actual princess first.

Hm? Did you hear anything? Ah, it must have been someone being jealous of my overwhelming superiority. Pay her no mind, such simple-minded people will never know what it's like to have an entire church of faithful followers that pray to you every day.
So you really did decide to leave all of your smaller things for last... Honestly, how can you call yourself a princess when you lack this much class?
You have no place to talk about patience when you've got such a horrible attitude, which by the way, is precisely the reason why you're not the greatest princess. Not even by a long shot.
Pfft! What makes you think I want to see you in your "full glory"? Honestly, I can't picture any glory coming from you.
Your mood?! How do you think I feel having to listen to you prattle on and on about how great you are?? You must be so delusional that you fail to realize everyone finds you annoying!
Hmm, is that how it is? Mm... This is a really tough case indeed... Hmm... I guess I can make an exception for a case such as this... {small}Mostly because it'd be a hassle to deal with right now...
My my, an impressive God indeed. How curious that I hadn't heard of him... Oh, and what kind of beliefs does the church of Barbatos have?
Oh, really? A witch inspired you to hone your voice? How unusual... Does this Alice have a thing for music or something?
Eh...? Wait, don't tell me you have sensors on your feet or something...
Aw, darn... I'm glad it doesn't bother you, but if you've been blind since birth it'd be pretty hard to cure...

You fell into a cave?
...honestly, now I'm surprised you were even able to get out of that.
Oh! Waterbenders? I see! So it is magic after all!
Oooh, that's great to hear! Must be pretty cool to have you as a teacher!

I see... Yeah, I guess it's kind of hard to picture something you've never experienced before... But, there's a lot of things you could try out for the first time! It'd be like rediscovering the world all over again!
I see... I guess even someone strong like you would struggle with that... I can't imagine how hard it must've been to run away if you couldn't even see with your seismic sense like you do now...
Earth Rumble... Tournaments? What're those? Are they some kind of sport?
Oh yeah? And just what business does a demon like you have here?
I am absolutely not concerned about you in the slightest, demon! If anything, I hope you don't find your way back home!
I am not concerned for your well being, you stupid demon! If anything, I hope you get lost on your way back!
If you're so good at controlling it, why is it moving so much then?
Really? If you can control it so well, why is it wiggling all over the place?
Clothes from a demon? Please, I'd get something better by looking in the garbage.
And accept a gift from a demon? Absolutely not! I'd much rather walk around naked!
Is that so? Good to know, you demons should know your place. Maybe you should give up on this pointless bravery and run away with your tail between your legs while you still can.
Oh really? Good. You demons should know your place, which is firmly beneath me. Why not just cut your losses and run away now? Who knows what the almighty goddess might do to you on your way out...
You did?! Don't tell me you actually fought in the war...
Ah, so it's a normal kind of nation, I see. And where do you live, Toph? Is it a nice place?
Okay, that's... a lot to take in. But, who's this Avatar Aang? I mean, since the whole team is named after him...

Well, I'm from heaven, but you're probably asking about the food in Belzerg. I'd say it's pretty varied! It mostly depends on the kinds of crops and creatures that live near each respective civilization. For example, there's many giant toads near the city of Axel. so you can eat fried giant toads there!
That's quite the range you've got... Don't you have trouble sleeping? What with all the little critters you'd feel around you.
You could tell me about what you do, what your followers are like, and stuff like that!
Really now? My, so it's a bit of a one‑man army then? How impressive... I wish I had someone like that on my side.
Oh my, does he now? Well, I suppose we can't be too hard on him. Even an angel would be curious about the beauty of us goddesses, especially if it was the very goddess he worships.

Yes, honestly, I don't think it's fair at all that I have to deal with him instead of an actually capable adventurer. I swear, I'm going to give the heavens a piece of my mind once we deal with that damned Devil King.
Well, she certainly sounds like a unique goddess... Wait, did you say fanfics? Aren't those usually only written by weirdos and NEETs...?
U‑Useless...? That's... I guess it'd be bad to do those things if she's slacking off on her goddess duties, ahaha...
You have a sister? Aw, how cute. Does she also take care of her own goddess duties like you then?
A demigoddess? I see, that explains why your aura felt a little fainter than that of other goddesses...
Ah, yes, I'm familiar with those Japanese fox deities of agriculture and the like. What kind of demigod duties do you have then?
Are the people that come here really deserving of your pampering, though? I mean, sure, maybe some of them have sad lives. But they're probably fine enough if they can show up here.
So, you're into hearing people's heartbeat? You might as well become a doctor, then.
What? Ah... Did you... break up?
No, there's not really anything wrong with it. But with how much skin it shows, I suspected you might've worn it for this specifically.
Oh no, nothing's wrong with it. I was just wondering if you were showing off so much skin on purpose by wearing those clothes.
I see... Honestly, the idea of you getting better with that ability scares me a bit... What if you lost control and limbs started sprouting everywhere?
I figured... To be honest, that sounds kind of scary... What if it gets too powerful for you to control and limbs just start appearing everywhere?
That's great! You see, even though I'm the goddess of water, I don't actually visit the sea too often. Have you seen any interesting sights you'd like to share with me?
That's lovely! You know, I might be the goddess of water, but I don't get many chances to visit the sea myself. Have you seen any interesting things out there you'd like to share with me?
I see I see, sounds nice! Heh, you know... If you think about it, since I'm the goddess of water, you could say the whole sea is my domain, eh?
That's nice to hear! Heh... You know, since I'm the goddess of water, technically that whole time you've been navigating around my domain!

{smaller}Well, that answers my question...{!reset}
I said elemental spirit, Perona. Elemental spirits manipulate elements like lightning, fire, water, and so on. Which you haven't done so far.

{smaller}Guess that answers my question...{!reset}
Listen, Perona, I said elemental spirit. Elemental spirits can manipulate stuff like lightning, fire, and water. And you haven't exactly done any of that.
Threatening me, huh? Oh I dare you to try anything on me, you witch! I'll exorcise you and your stupid ghosts!
Go ahead and try, you ghost witch! I've dealt with way worse than the likes of you! I'll make you and your stupid ghosts regret messing with me!
Well, that's certainly nice, but I have no need for such a thing! I'm already a natural at several things!
That sounds nice, although I wouldn't need anything like that. As a goddess, I'm already great at doing many things!
The ocean didn't steal anything from you. It's just as natural as the land where you live in.
And what exactly are you going to drink after that? How are you going to bathe? Or wash your clothes? Are you even thinking this through?
Well, it's pretty obvious. Isn't that why you cling to Megumin so much?
No, I'm not calling you pathetic. I was referring to how much more... extravagant Megumin is. And all other Crimson Demons, for that matter.
Really? Even for an Arch Wizard like you? Are the standards for parties that high nowadays?

Of course not! That's amazing, Yunyun! Boy, you Crimson Demons really are something else!
...actually, why don't you join our party? With your help, we could get quests done in a flash!
My my, so you were actively looking for a strip poker place?
Money isn't everything, sure, but you can buy most things in life with it. I'd say that's a pretty good incentive for most people.
I mean, you have to admit you don't really look like a goddess. At least not a particularly graceful one...
Right right, but I still think you don't exactly look like a particularly graceful goddess. I think the average person wouldn't believe you if you told them you're one.
Wait... what?! A game where dying there kills you in real life too?? You can't be serious...
Eh...? Huh?! Dying in the game would kill you in real life?! And you were trapped in there?? That... can't be...
Hmm... If that's how you see it, I guess it's understandable. I do think life should be enjoyed to the fullest. But, you at least take breaks every so often, right?
Well... When you put it like that, I guess it's fine. I do believe you should enjoy life as you please. But, you do take breaks from it, right? It'd be bad for your eyes if you didn't.
Hmm... That sounds vaguely familiar... How do you play it? Does it have monster cards, spell cards, and the like?
They usually make them to sell the card game. Think about it! If you see an anime about a card game and you like it, wouldn't you want to buy it and try it out yourself?
Really? Hmph, well I think they either hid it from you, or your parents are fortune tellers.
But you do realize you can easily end up naked yourself, right? In fact, you probably will this game.
I see, can't say I've heard of---Wait... Wait a minute, what do you mean immortality?! Why were you attempting to obtain immortality?!
Don't be silly, Reimu! A goddess doesn't leave donations! A goddess receives donations! I was merely interested in your methods as a fellow exterminator of bad spirits.
Or... not. I guess you can take care of a weak one like that, huh...
(Hmm... What could it be that's bothering me with her... Is she saying something...?)
W-Wait, why are you...
That outfit is a big step up from that tracksuit you were wearing when you got reincarnated, don't you think?
That cape is actually pretty cool. Or well, it would be, if it wasn't being worn by a shut‑in NEET like you.
Now that I think about it... You really didn't put any thought into what you put on for this game, did you? That's just what you wear all the time...
(It sure is weird to see Kazuma undressing in this context...)
(Looking at him like this... It's hard to believe this guy has to beat the Devil King for me to return to heaven...)
Huh?! Wait, w‑what are you stealing?!
Eh?! W‑What are you...

You're lucky all of the adventuring we've done has put your body in a decent shape. If you had shown up here when you were just a good for nothing shut‑in NEET... Heh, this would've been really pathetic.
